Uses of Class
entities.Continent

Packages that use Continent
Package Description
entities
Contains basic entities used in the game like countries, continents, map and player.

  • Uses of Continent in entities

    Methods in entities that return Continent
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Continent Country.getContinent()
    method to get continent to which country belongs
    Methods in entities that return types with arguments of type Continent
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Continent> GameMap.getContinents()
    method that returns all the continents
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Continent> Player.getContinents()
    method to get the continents occupied by player
    Methods in entities with parameters of type Continent
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Player.addContinent​(Continent p_continent)
    method to add continent to player when player wins all the countries in that continent
    boolean Player.checkContinent​(Continent p_continent)
    method to check if player owns all countries of a continent
